ps3.2:1.3: Iddhiyā kati bhūmiyo, kati pādā, kati padāni, kati mūlāni?
ps3.2:1.9: Iddhiyā catasso bhūmiyo, cattāro pādā, aṭṭha padāni, soḷasa mūlāni.
ps3.2:2.2: Adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikubbanā iddhi, manomayā iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, samādhivipphārā iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi, puññavato iddhi, vijjāmayā iddhi, tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi.
ps3.2:3.2: Vivekajābhūmi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, pītisukhabhūmi dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ, upekkhāsukhabhūmi tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ, adukkhamasukhābhūmi catutthaṃ jhānaṃ.
ps3.2:3.3: Iddhiyā imā catasso bhūmiyo iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṃvattantīti.
ps3.2:4.2: Idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti.
ps3.2:4.3: Iddhiyā ime cattāro pādā iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṃvattantīti.
ps3.2:5.2: Chandañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṃ.
ps3.2:5.3: Chando na samādhi, samādhi na chando.
ps3.2:5.5: Vīriyañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṃ.
ps3.2:5.6: Vīriyaṃ na samādhi, samādhi na vīriyaṃ.
ps3.2:5.8: Cittañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṃ.
ps3.2:5.9: Cittaṃ na samādhi, samādhi na cittaṃ.
ps3.2:5.11: Vīmaṃsañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṃ.
ps3.2:5.12: Vīmaṃsā na samādhi, samādhi na vīmaṃsā.
ps3.2:5.14: Iddhiyā imāni aṭṭha padāni iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṃvattantīti.
ps3.2:6.12: Saddhāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ assaddhiye na iñjatīti—āneñjaṃ.
ps3.2:6.13: Vīriyena pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ kosajje na iñjatīti—āneñjaṃ.
ps3.2:6.14: Satiyā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ pamāde na iñjatīti—āneñjaṃ.
ps3.2:6.15: Samādhinā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ uddhacce na iñjatīti—āneñjaṃ.
ps3.2:6.16: Paññāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ avijjāya na iñjatīti—āneñjaṃ.
ps3.2:6.18: Iddhiyā imāni soḷasa mūlāni iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṃvattantīti.
ps3.2:7.3: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti;
ps3.2:7.5: tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati, seyyathāpi ākāse;
ps3.2:7.8: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
ps3.2:7.9: imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjati;
ps3.2:8.1: **Idhā**ti imissā diṭṭhiyā imissā khantiyā imissā ruciyā imasmiṃ ādāye imasmiṃ dhamme imasmiṃ vinaye imasmiṃ dhammavinaye imasmiṃ pāvacane imasmiṃ brahmacariye imasmiṃ satthusāsane.
ps3.2:8.4: **Bhikkhū**ti puthujjanakalyāṇako vā hoti bhikkhu sekho vā arahā vā akuppadhammo.
ps3.2:8.6: **Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī**ti pakatiyā eko bahukaṃ āvajjati, sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā āvajjati.
ps3.2:8.10: Yathāyasmā cūḷapanthako ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, evamevaṃ so iddhimā cetovasippatto ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti.
ps3.2:8.11: **Bahudhāpi hutvā eko hotī**ti pakatiyā bahuko ekaṃ āvajjati;
ps3.2:8.15: Yathāyasmā cūḷapanthako bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti, evamevaṃ so iddhimā cetovasippatto bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti.
ps3.2:9.1: **Āvibhāvan**ti kenaci anāvaṭaṃ hoti appaṭicchannaṃ vivaṭaṃ pākaṭaṃ.
ps3.2:9.2: **Tirobhāvan**ti kenaci āvaṭaṃ hoti paṭicchannaṃ pihitaṃ paṭikujjitaṃ.
ps3.2:9.3: **Tirokuṭṭaṃ** **tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati, seyyathāpi** **ākāse**ti pakatiyā ākāsakasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:9.9: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kenaci anāvaṭe aparikkhitte asajjamānā gacchanti, evamevaṃ so iddhimā cetovasippatto tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchati, seyyathāpi ākāse.
ps3.2:10.1: **Pathaviyāpi ummujjanimujjaṃ karoti, seyyathāpi udake**ti pakatiyā āpokasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:10.7: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto udake ummujjanimujjaṃ karonti, evamevaṃ so iddhimā cetovasippatto pathaviyā ummujjanimujjaṃ karoti, seyyathāpi udake.
ps3.2:11.1: **Udakepi abhijjamāne gacchati, seyyathāpi pathaviyan**ti pakatiyā pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:11.7: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto abhijjamānāya pathaviyā gacchanti, evamevaṃ so iddhimā cetovasippatto abhijjamāne udake gacchati, seyyathāpi pathaviyaṃ.
ps3.2:12.1: **Ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo**ti pakatiyā pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:12.6: So ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti.
ps3.2:12.7: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto pathaviyā caṅkamantipi tiṭṭhantipi nisīdantipi seyyampi kappenti, evamevaṃ so iddhimā cetovasippatto ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo.
ps3.2:13.1: **Imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjatī**ti idha so iddhimā cetovasippatto nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye āvajjati.
ps3.2:13.5: So nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye pāṇinā āmasati parāmasati parimajjati.
ps3.2:13.6: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kiñcideva rūpagataṃ hatthapāse āmasanti parāmasanti parimajjanti, evamevaṃ so iddhimā cetovasippatto nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye pāṇinā āmasati parāmasati parimajjati.
ps3.2:14.1: **Yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattetī**ti sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto brahmalokaṃ gantukāmo hoti, dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhāti—
ps3.2:14.13: Dibbena cakkhunā tassa brahmuno rūpaṃ passati.
ps3.2:14.14: Dibbāya sotadhātuyā tassa brahmuno saddaṃ suṇāti.
ps3.2:14.16: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gantukāmo hoti, kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmeti, kāyavasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
ps3.2:14.17: Kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmetvā, kāyavasena cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā, sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gacchati.
ps3.2:14.18: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gantukāmo hoti, cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmeti, cittavasena kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
ps3.2:14.19: Cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmetvā, cittavasena kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṃ gacchati.
ps3.2:14.20: So tassa brahmuno purato rūpiṃ abhinimmināti manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ ahīnindriyaṃ.
ps3.2:14.21: Sace so iddhimā caṅkamati, nimmitopi tattha caṅkamati.
ps3.2:14.22: Sace so iddhimā tiṭṭhati, nimmitopi tattha tiṭṭhati.
ps3.2:14.23: Sace so iddhimā nisīdati, nimmitopi tattha nisīdati.
ps3.2:14.24: Sace so iddhimā seyyaṃ kappeti, nimmitopi tattha seyyaṃ kappeti.
ps3.2:14.25: Sace so iddhimā dhūmāyati, nimmitopi tattha dhūmāyati.
ps3.2:14.26: Sace so iddhimā pajjalati, nimmitopi tattha pajjalati.
ps3.2:14.27: Sace so iddhimā dhammaṃ bhāsati, nimmitopi tattha dhammaṃ bhāsati.
ps3.2:14.28: Sace so iddhimā pañhaṃ pucchati, nimmitopi tattha pañhaṃ pucchati.
ps3.2:14.29: Sace so iddhimā pañhaṃ puṭṭho visajjeti, nimmitopi tattha pañhaṃ puṭṭho visajjeti.
ps3.2:14.30: Sace so iddhimā tena brahmunā saddhiṃ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṃ samāpajjati, nimmitopi tattha tena brahmunā saddhiṃ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṃ samāpajjati.
ps3.2:14.31: Yaññadeva so iddhimā karoti, taṃtadeva hi so nimmito karotīti—
ps3.2:15.2: Sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa abhibhū nāma sāvako brahmaloke ṭhito sahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpesi.
ps3.2:15.5: dissamānenapi heṭṭhimena upaḍḍhakāyena adissamānenapi uparimena upaḍḍhakāyena dhammaṃ desesi.
ps3.2:15.6: Dissamānenapi uparimena upaḍḍhakāyena, adissamānenapi heṭṭhimena upaḍḍhakāyena dhammaṃ desesi.
ps3.2:15.7: So pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, yakkhavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, indavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, devavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, brahmavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, samuddavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, pabbatavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, vanavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, sīhavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, byagghavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, dīpivaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti, hatthimpi dasseti, assampi dasseti, rathampi dasseti, pattimpi dasseti, vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetīti—
ps3.2:16.2: Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ ahīnindriyaṃ.
ps3.2:16.8: Seyyathā vā pana puriso asiṃ kosiyā pavāheyya.
ps3.2:16.13: Seyyathā vā pana puriso ahiṃ karaṇḍā uddhareyya.
ps3.2:16.18: Evamevaṃ bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ ahīnindriyaṃ.
ps3.2:17.11: Āyasmato bākulassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, āyasmato saṅkiccassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, āyasmato bhūtapālassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi.
ps3.2:18.8: ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā rūpasaññāya paṭighasaññāya nānattasaññāya pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti …pe…
ps3.2:18.13: Āyasmato sāriputtassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, āyasmato sañjīvassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, āyasmato khāṇukoṇḍaññassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, uttarāya upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhi, sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhi.
ps3.2:19.7: “paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan”ti, appaṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati.
ps3.2:19.9: “appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan”ti, paṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati.
ps3.2:19.11: “paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyyaṃ sato sampajāno”ti, upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajāno.
ps3.2:20.2: Aniṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ mettāya vā pharati, dhātuto vā upasaṃharati.
ps3.2:21.2: Iṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ asubhāya vā pharati, aniccato vā upasaṃharati.
ps3.2:22.1: Kathaṃ **paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī viharati?**
ps3.2:22.2: Aniṭṭhasmiñca iṭṭhasmiñca vatthusmiṃ mettāya vā pharati, dhātuto vā upasaṃharati.
ps3.2:22.3: Evaṃ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī viharati.
ps3.2:23.1: Kathaṃ **appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati?**
ps3.2:23.2: Iṭṭhasmiñca aniṭṭhasmiñca vatthusmiṃ asubhāya vā pharati, aniccato vā upasaṃharati.
ps3.2:23.3: Evaṃ appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
ps3.2:24.1: Kathaṃ **paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā** **upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno?**
ps3.2:24.2: Idha bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
ps3.2:24.7: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
ps3.2:24.8: Evaṃ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
ps3.2:25.2: Sabbesaṃ pakkhīnaṃ, sabbesaṃ devānaṃ, ekaccānaṃ manussānaṃ, ekaccānaṃ vinipātikānaṃ.
ps3.2:26.2: Rājā cakkavattī vehāsaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya, antamaso assabandhagopurise upādāya.
ps3.2:26.3: Jotikassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi, jaṭilassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi, meṇḍakassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi, ghositassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi, pañcannaṃ mahāpuññānaṃ puññavato iddhi.
ps3.2:27.2: Vijjādharā vijjaṃ parijappetvā vehāsaṃ gacchanti, ākāse antalikkhe hatthimpi dassenti, assampi dassenti, rathampi dassenti, pattimpi dassenti, vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassenti.
ps3.2:28.8: Evaṃ tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi.
